name: Guardian Starship (Josant)
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

Destroy the enemy ship before your friendly ship is destroyed.

Every 10 seconds you will have an improvement to your shot, it can improve 3 times, but if you take a lot of damage your shot will be nerfed.

CONTROLS:

[Arrow Keys / WASD] Move

[Left Click] Shoot/Aim

[F] Pause

CREDITS:

- Music by Bert Cole www.bitbybitsound.com

- Graphics by Kenney
